welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lanham, USA! Home to charming streets, friendly locals, and a rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is dedicated to serving military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI Airport serves as the hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at BWI Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines and its affiliated carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at BWI Airport serves a variety of airlines including American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at BWI Airport serves a variety of airlines including JetBlue, Spirit, and Alaska.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
